title: UIC Alumni Association | Advancement | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: It all starts with a single spark          Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Advancement     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Advancement      Advancement   Main Menu    UIC Alumni Association           Alumni Exchange    Events    Awards and Traditions    Class Notes    Volunteer    Alumni Benefits    Alumni Career Services         IGNITE:  The Campaign for UIC           Give Now    IGNITE Priorities    Understanding Giving         Stories           Extraordinary Alumni    IGNITE Campaign    Student Successes    Driving Discovery    Empowering Faculty    Community Connections         About Advancement           Directory    Connect to College    Advancement Careers          Eyebrow menu    Give Now    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu            UIC Alumni Association  Explore the possibilities of a lifelong relationship with UIC.  This is a historic time for UIC.  We have proudly launched UIC’s first alumni association.  This new organization will focus solely on UIC alumni and bring our strong alumni network together to support common goals, such as UIC’s students and their success.  We have an opportunity now to reimagine the opportunities UIC creates for you to engage with UIC and with one another in meaningful ways.  Our community is unique in that more than 80 percent of UIC alumni live and work in the Chicago area, which means we can truly join forces to carry UIC’s mission forward and help achieve its ambitious goals.  Please explore the services we offer and ways you can get involved, and share your opinions on how you would like to engage .
